title: Spaced Repetition
description: Review words at scientifically-optimized intervals to move them into long-term memory.

title: Active Recall
description: Instead of passive reading, you actively retrieve words from memory, strengthening neural pathways.

title: Corrective Feedback
description: Get immediate corrections when you use words incorrectly, helping you learn the right way.

title: Personal Relevance
description: Learn words that matter to you and your goals, making them more memorable and useful.
